text: ο Eridani (Latinised as Omicron Eridani) refers to two distinct star systems in the constellation of Eridanus: * Omicron¹ Eridani (ο¹ Eridani), or 38 Eridani, also named Beid * Omicron2 Eridani (ο2 Eridani), better known as 40 Eridani, with traditional name "Keid" Category:Eridanus (constellation) Eridani, Omicron
title: Omicron Eridani
